mapper.sql: select id, menu_model, menu_name, parent_id, menu_type, path, request_url, request_query, permission_sign, open_type, is_cache, icon, visible, order_num, is_admin_visit, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, stop_flag, delete_flag from sys_common_menu
mapper.select: select m.id, menu_model, menu_name, parent_id, menu_type, path, request_url, request_query, permission_sign, open_type, is_cache, icon, visible, order_num, is_admin_visit, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, stop_flag, delete_flag from sys_common_menu m join sys_enterprise_menu em on em.ent_id = #{entId} and em.menu_id = m.id

select distinct m.menu_model from sys_common_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where m.delete_flag = 0 and ur.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct m.permission_sign from sys_common_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where m.delete_flag = 0

select distinct m.permission_sign from sys_common_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role r on r.id = ur.role_id where m.stop_flag = 0 and m.delete_flag = 0 and r.stop_flag = 0 and ur.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct m.permission_sign from sys_common_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where m.stop_flag = 0 and m.delete_flag = 0 and rm.role_id = #{roleId}
select count(1) from sys_common_menu where parent_id = #{menuId}
